official_title: A bill to prohibit the export of timber harvested from public lands within the National Forest System created from the public domain located west of the 100th meridian.

summary.text: Public Land Timber Conservation Act - Prohibits the export of timber harvested from public lands of the United States, including lands within the National forest System created from the public domain located west of the one hundredth meridian, unless the particular species of lumber to be exported is surplus to domestic needs.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the export of timber harvested from public lands within the National Forest System created from the public domain located west of the 100th meridian.
